attributes.action: Stop 11 BILLION aid  overseas instead pay £500 for each pensioner for heating costs.
attributes.additional_details:
The government has no right to spend 11 Billion on overseas aid while old people that are the ones that paid fully in to this system from teenagers to pension age to ensure old age safety. Why should be told to live in one room while the government uses their money for aid oversea. It is time they were stopped from doing has they please with tax payers money charity begins at home.
So please sign this we will all be old and cold maybe one day. £500 for each per year could make a massive difference.
